column4: Having a little trouble getting cron to work on Ubuntu Server 11.04; but I'm sort of new to it in general, so I guess that's to be expected.
Best to just ask the question, and if anyone can help, they will.  Make sure you have a carriage return at the end of the line.
er, sorry, the "carriage return" comment was regarding your crontab. not your IRC question :)
